title: Ash Training DAY 2.2
description: Deep dive into liquidity, smart money movements, and liquidity sweeps in trading.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• What draw on liquidity means
• Where liquidity concentrates (equal highs/lows)
• How smart money hunts stops and grabs liquidity
• The concept of liquidity sweeps
• Why understanding liquidity improves entry timing
• Recognizing institutional order placement

quiz.question: What is draw on liquidity?
quiz.explanation: Draw on liquidity is when price moves toward and absorbs the liquidity clustered at key levels.

quiz.question: Liquidity is commonly found at:
quiz.explanation: Liquidity pools at equal highs and lows where stop losses and orders cluster.

quiz.question: Smart money often targets:
quiz.explanation: Institutional traders hunt retail stop losses to grab liquidity before large moves.

quiz.question: A liquidity sweep usually:
quiz.explanation: Liquidity sweeps grab stops and institutional orders before the market moves in the intended direction.

quiz.question: Understanding liquidity improves:
quiz.explanation: Knowing where liquidity sits allows for better entry placement and improved trade execution.
